page.title: 16 FARMING
page.content: Farming in this area is important because of the fertile soil.Hay, turnips and pulses for silage are all winter crops for feeding cattle.The farmers can have a little hay and turnip and pulses for silage,or they have a lot of the one crop.Because of the rich soil and the climate of this area we grow soft fruit such as Strawberries and Rasberries for jam and canning or for dye.Farmers would have some cattle.They might have some sheep up in the high areas where the grass isn't very rich.They might have a few pigs for fattening and some chickens for eggs.There was a private nursery in the area again showing how ideal the soil is for growing young plants.
